author: Mike Kerrigan
title: Mike Kerrigan: During coronavirus shutdown, the waitress who tipped me – and other Easter miracles
description: In response to North Carolina’s stay-at-home order, my favorite local diner closed.
content:

The COVID-19 pandemic reminds us of the reality the future is promised to nobody. None of us knows the final day or hour. Yet who lives every day with the vigilance … [+2847 chars]
